channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12905] Clean up presence of hadoop annotations in 0.98
item.description:
while working on HBASE-12898, hadoop-annotations showed up as an undeclared dependency.

Looks like a hand full of hadoop InterfaceAudience annotations made it in through backports.
item.summary: Clean up presence of hadoop annotations in 0.98

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
hbase busbey$ grep -r "org.apache.hadoop.classification" *

hbase-client/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/ipc/RegionServerCoprocessorRpcChannel.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/BaseReplicationEndpoint.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/ChainWALEntryFilter.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/HBaseReplicationEndpoint.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/regionserver/HBaseInterClusterReplicationEndpoint.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/ReplicationEndpoint.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/ScopeWALEntryFilter.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/SystemTableWALEntryFilter.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;

hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/replication/WALEntryFilter.java:import org.apache.hadoop.classification.InterfaceAudience;
patch for 0.98. manually checked compilation and building the site.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12693935/HBASE-12905-0.98.1.patch.txt
against master branch at commit 319f9bb7918af8cfe7e65f97b654f37f0d5983f3.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12693935

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/12550//console

This message is automatically generated.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-0.98 #810 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98/810/)

This issue was closed as part of a bulk closing operation on 2015-11-20. All issues that have been resolved and where all fixVersions have been released have been closed (following discussions on the mailing list).
